description:
Takakamo Shizuno is a first year at Achiga Girls School. In her elementary days she befriended Nodoka Haramura and together played mahjong in the middle/high school mahjong club. She was the clubs second best player before it was disband. Her goal is to go to the nationals and play against Nodoka.
Source: Saki Wikia
name: Takakamo Shizuno
